chapter.title: Examples
chapter.para: The JBoss Messaging distribution comes with a wide variety of examples demonstrating many of the features in an easy to use, fully functional examples.

The examples are available in the distribution, in the examples directory. Examples are split into JMS and Core examples. JMS examples show how a particular feature can be used by a normal JMS client. Core examples (TODO) show how the equivalent feature can be used by a core messaging client.
To run a JMS example, simply cd into the appropriate example directory and type ant
Here's a listing of the examples
